alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 5:49PM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Patchy blowing snow will continue tonight with light snow expected to redevelop late tonight and persist into Thursday morning. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Livingston County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Thursday, with conditions gradually improving through the day Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to patchy blowing snow and lingering snow covered roads tonight and into Thursday morning. The hazardous conditions are likely to impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
